definitions.definition: A spherical pot , specifically a water pot used for washing and ablution , typically made of brass.
A person who switches loyalties, especially from one political party to another, engaging in lotacracy .

main_definition: ( South Asia ) A spherical pot , specifically a water pot used for washing and ablution , typically made of brass.
secondary_definitions: ( Pakistani politics ) A person who switches loyalties, especially from one political party to another, engaging in lotacracy .
